oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parole of Major James Howell Jones, 1st Cav. CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Maj. James Howell Jones, 1st Cav., CSA and Ky. Quartermaster Department received this parole upon swearing not to take up arms against the United States or perform any military duty. The document described Jones as 5'6" tall, with dark hair, blue eyes; and a florid complexion. (research or call Lee Cate - see form)
